fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You can choose a player to hire at night, draining their will to live and attacking them
- Send a Karen into your store during the night. 3 Uses, may be used in conjunction w/ hiring.
- View security camera footage of a player during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The vampire headquarters are in ASDA, and your attack target, if they survive, will learn all members of the vampires.
- Sending a Karen into your store will buff your attack to Unstoppable.
- When you view security camera footage of a player, you will be notified who they target the following night when they target them.
- FUCK TESCO

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert or kill everyone who would oppose you.
